subject: Learning
title: Digital Minimalism
description: Learn Digital Minimalism in one minute.

hook.text: Cal Newport deleted all social media for 30 days. He found he missed nothing that mattered.

buildup.text: Digital minimalism is a philosophy: use technology intentionally, not by default.

discovery.text: It means choosing tools that serve your values and eliminating those that merely entertain or distract.

twist.text: Most people can't name what value Instagram adds to their lifeâ€”yet they spend hours on it daily.

climax.text: Minimalists report better focus, deeper relationships, and more time for meaningful hobbies.

punchline.text: Use technology. Don't let it use you.

quiz.question: What is the core principle of digital minimalism?
options: Use technology intentionally to serve your values, not by default
Only use technology for work purposes
